content.content: Half of the UNI reward tokens should go to a set of selected invaluable pools where people can mine  more UNI as a reward for providing liquidity. The other half gets pooled with a few new pools together with a matched amount of another token. The initial liquidity supply should be locked so there is alway plenty of liquidity and no rug pull. Pair UNI with the more decent projects and I think uni will quickly gain tracktion as the go to token for liquidity. This put also less tokens in circulation, good for the price. People a getting instant fast small slippage transactions with uni which incrreases exposure and adoption.
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing a new system for Uni mining, where half of the UNI reward tokens go to selected pools and the other half gets pooled with another token. The author believes this will increase liquidity and adoption of Uni. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
